artifacts.description: Capybara + Selenium testing guide. Covers DatabaseCleaner truncation for JS tests, SQLite file-based requirement, FlexiAdmin UI patterns (sorting via Turbo Stream, bulk selection, hidden elements), and debugging techniques.

Dummy Rails app setup guide. Covers esbuild watch mode configuration, FlexiAdmin component chain pattern (IndexPage → Resources → ListView), controller conventions (q, fa_sort, fa_order), and common issues.
UI test case specifications for User Management module. Defines expected behavior for search, filter, sorting, pagination, bulk actions, and CRUD operations.
Historical project progress summary from October 2025 to February 2026.

metadata.description: FlexiAdmin is a Rails engine providing an admin interface framework with ViewComponent-based architecture, Stimulus controllers, and Turbo Stream integration.

conventions.testing: RSpec + Capybara + Selenium, DatabaseCleaner with truncation for JS tests, file-based SQLite (NOT :memory:)
conventions.javascript: esbuild with watch mode (context + watch), Stimulus controllers
conventions.components: ViewComponent chain: IndexPage → Resources → ListView, Slim templates delegate to gem
conventions.params: Search: q, Sort: fa_sort/fa_order, Pagination: fa_page/fa_per_page
